item.title: Pi and exion client crowns help
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Update the client’s text engine, so you can use the <img=#> codes, or add the crowns to the client/cache.

Also, you need to stop making so many topics.

Make ONE topic with ALL your problems, and when you find a new one, go back and edit it.

Read full topic
item.source: Pi and exion client crowns help
